column8: Bleeding polearm that excels after interrupts and speeds movement through lava slicks.
Water-walking boost after opening chests and extra dock faction reputation.
Reduces slows and pings allies when frost hazards are about to strike.
Grants brief water stealth while still and improves glowspore reagent drops.
Blocks build a nature shield and increase rare herb gather yields.
Adds poison resistance and turns overheal into ally-healing spore bursts.
Plants a fortifying aura banner and boosts wall faction reputation gains.
Halves fire damage while channeling and heals when extinguishing hazards.
Reflects spell damage and reveals invisible foes briefly after blocking.
Stacks sunder on armored targets and absorbs fire while stationary.
Off-hand tome boosting shadow resistance and revealing stealth caches.
Airborne crit polearm that grants group sprint after scoring kills.
